content.question: Lenin’s quote in the second paragraph best illustrates which of the following developments?

choices.label: Lenin’s dogmatic adherence to the principles outlined by Karl Marx
Lenin’s growing acceptance of anarchist critiques of Marxist principles
Lenin’s willingness to compromise Marxist principles when necessary to achieve his goals
Lenin’s growing concern with the influence Stalin was exercising on the Bolshevik party

content.answer: Lenin’s willingness to compromise Marxist principles when necessary to achieve his goals

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
